content: I started porting this file in !4#2424 but it seems like a lot of simp lemmas are simply not firing. I also had to resort to erw in some places which is really not ideal. I don't have time to diagnose these issues right now, so any help getting this file in shape (preferably with proofs that are as short as those from mathlib3) would be great!
Oh, and I still haven't fixed a good number of the proofs, so there are still a good number of sorries in this branch
